title: 二叉树的最大深度 (Maximum Depth of Binary Tree)
content: 思路: // @Title: 二叉树的最大深度 (Maximum Depth of Binary Tree) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2024-09-14 23:36:49 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 41.8 MB // @comment: // @flag: /** * Definition for a binary tree node. * public class TreeNode { * int val; * TreeNode left; * TreeNode right; * TreeNode() {} * TreeNode(int val) { this.val = val; } * TreeNode(int val, TreeNode left, TreeNode right) { * this.val = val; * this.left = left; * this.right = right; * } * } */ class Solution { public int maxDepth(TreeNode root) { if(root==null){ return 0; } return Math.max(maxDepth(root.left),maxDepth(root.right))+1; } } 思路: // @Title: 二叉树的最大深度 (Maximum Depth of Binary Tree) // @Author: qisiii // @Date: 2022-02-28 20:22:24 // @Runtime: 0 ms // @Memory: 40.7 MB // @comment: // @flag: /** * Definition for a binary tree node. * public class TreeNode { * int val; * TreeNode left; * TreeNode right; * TreeNode() {} * TreeNode(int val) { this.val = val; } * TreeNode(int val, TreeNode left, TreeNode right) { * this.val = val; * this.left = left; * this.right = right; * } * } */ class Solution { public int maxDepth(TreeNode root) { if(root==null){ return 0; } return Math.max(maxDepth(root.left),maxDepth(root.right))+1; } }
